name: Pacman3D
text: Technic demo of the famous old game Pac-man, made in Unity and the scripts files in C#, the Pacman model is not mine and the ghost models are made, mainly by my teacher. but I added the eyes movement on the game's production. Due to lack of time, the ghost I.As it's just a premade path.
